# GitHub Templates

This directory contains templates for GitHub issues and pull requests.

## ğŸ“ Files

- **ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md** - Template for reporting bugs
- **ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md** - Template for feature requests
- **pull_request_template.md** - Template for pull requests

## ğŸš€ Usage

GitHub automatically uses these templates when you create new issues or pull requests through the web interface.

- **New Issue:** Click "New issue" on the Issues tab
- **New PR:** Create a pull request and the template will be suggested

## ğŸ“ Customization

To update templates:

1. Edit the template file
2. Commit and push changes
3. Template will be used for all new issues/PRs going forward
